item.title: AO Archive: Open-Source vs. Build-Your-Own
item.description: https://spin.atomicobject.com/2019/04/02/open-source-vs-home-made/ This is a blog post I wrote while working at Atomic Object. It adapts an idea from Mike Marsiglia as a heuristic for when to write your own code instead of relying on OSS.
